text: “(Farawo) adanena: “Ha! Mwamkhulupirira ndisadakupatseni chilolezo? Ndithu iye ndi mkulu wanu amene adakuphunzitsani matsenga! Choncho ndikudulani manja anu ndi miyendo yanu, mosemphanitsa:; (dzanja lakudzanjadzanja ndi mwendo wakumanzere. Pomwe wina, mkono wakumanzere ndi mwendo wakudzanjadzanja), ndipo kenako ndikupachikani pa mathunthu a mitengo ya kanjeza; ndithu mudziwa (panthawiyo) kuti ndani mwa ife, (ine kapena Mulungu wa Mûsa), wachilango chaukali ndi chopitilira.”
